Articles.Content:
I keep getting this message whenever I try to use the patcher to update KSP.

Unable to authenticate with the server: Received malformed data from the server: File not found.

And then it stops, whenever I try to cancel or close it says that it may corrupt my install.

I don't want to download the the whole KSP install again, that'll kill my bandwidth for the month. Some tips?

EDIT:

05/02/2015 11:11:25 AM [INFO    ]: ---------------

05/02/2015 11:11:38 AM [INFO    ]: Getting login token...

That's the patcher.log file.

Edited May 2, 2015 by Starwhip
We're aware of the issue, and are looking into it

We're aware of the issue, and are looking into it

Thank you very much.
Same issue, I need to patch it and can't download where I currently am for the life of me, would like to figure out why it wont work.

Same issue, I need to patch it and can't download where I currently am for the life of me, would like to figure out why it wont work.
We're aware of the issue, and are looking into it

They're working on it.
I'm hoping this gets fixed soon so I can get 1.0.2...

05/02/2015 11:11:25 AM [DEBUG ]: Handing everything over to Qt. Hold onto your butts..

This is why we love you guys, SQUAD

This is why we love you guys, SQUAD

I know, right?
Any news on this issue? It has been quite a while.

As the problem still does not seem to be solved, I'm downloading from the KSP Store now.

Ah, well.
Not so great for those of us who have a lot of mods, huh? I was hoping the days of deleting and reinstalling 20+ mods every micropatch were over.
Eh I don't complain plus it's quicker for my computer with downloading the zip file
I know this has been dead for a few weeks but.. any word of a fix for this problem or should i just redownload ksp 1.0.4?
I wish they would fix this. It'd be very useful.

This is still an issue. Trying to patch to 1.0.5 and patcher says "malformed data, blah blah blah."

Do I have to re-install the the whole game to get the update? I purchased through KSP store. (##$#@!! Steam)

This is still an issue. Trying to patch to 1.0.5 and patcher says "malformed data, blah blah blah."

Do I have to re-install the the whole game to get the update? I purchased through KSP store. (##$#@!! Steam)

For the moment, redownloading the game from the KSP store through your account seems to be the only way. Unless you've got KSP on Steam.
